description: Calvin Banks starts dating again but keeps his guard up after having his ex-cheat on him. He meets Kory Houston and the two fall into a relationship, not long into it he notices strange behaviours from Kory. Behaviours that seem way too familiar. He decides to follow him one day and is stunned to see him at his co-worker's house.   He is cheating on him! Kory selfishly goes to the gorgeous Roman Todd for a wild forbidden hard-core ass fucking, cock sucking session leaving them both climaxing like never before!
title: Deja-Vu
